original: Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ
analyzed: saraṇam āsavam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇa

original: āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ
analyzed: āsavam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam āsava

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo ca naaraṇo noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ noāsavaḥ ca na araṇaḥ noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Saraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sa asavam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na sa asavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Etena upāyena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka etena upāyena sabbattha vitthāretabba
